text: A member of the dark convents of the Sorceresses and serves the Witch King. She also commands devastatingly destructive magic.
Corpses of those slain by the Kharibdyss, Summoned to life with dark magic.
As Chief Handmaiden it her sworn duty to protect the everqueen and lead her handmaidens into battle.
Captain of the Black Guard is the longest-serving member of Malekith's personal army.
A High Mage of Saphery, a Princess, and a relative of the Phoenix King Finubar. she has led's the defense of Ulthuan againest the darkness that threat it.
Glade lady of the High Realm of Cythral and watcher of the Wildwoods.
